content:
{"name": "Deaf Shalom Zone, Community Meal", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Self select including limited frozen meats and some fresh produce as available.  On the fourth Friday of the month, milk and eggs.

Nearest bus: 
Bus #76 is a .4 mile, 9 minute walk to Wilkens & Leeds
Citilink Purple is a .9 mile, 22 minute walk to Beechfield Ave & Thornfield

- In 2023 we will be open Wednesday 11/22 before Thanksgiving, and closed on Friday. 
We will be open as usual on the Fridays before Christmas and New Years.  

- In 2024 we anticipate being open on Wednesday 3/27, and closed on Good Friday, then again, open the Wednesday before Thanksgiving and closed the Friday after. ", "email": "", "url": "https://deafshalomzone.org/contact-us", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1040 South Beechfield Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Baltimore", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "21229", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.26352, "longitude": -76.68764}, "phones": [{"number": "(410) 242-6303", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Sunday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Sunday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Wear Facemask"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
